New Records: J.P. Crawford set a new MLB record for hit-by-pitch in the season
Key Match Events: Texas Rangers tied the game in the 7th inning with a home run by Leody Taveras
Marcus Semien delivered the winning run in the 9th inning with a single
Seattle Mariners had a five-run lead that evaporated in a 6-5 walk-off loss
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Dan Wilson highlighted the team's resilience and preparation for the next games
Player Cal Raleigh emphasized the team's determination to continue their playoff push
